title: Global variables
author: CarloRamponi

comments.body:
Global variables were not handled correctly because:

1. constant bank 4 which is where the globals live in this example was not even referenced in the qmd launch command due to the constant not refering to a function. Introduced a null function, whose constants are appended to all functions.
2. alignment failure of sections to 128. Added logic to rebuild the image align to 128 and adjust section addresses.
